title: Executive Order 6818-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 1222, Dated July 1, 1910, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910 (ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497), it is ordered that Executive Order No. 1222, dated July 1, 1910, withdrawing public lands in Arizona, be, and it is hereby, revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 19 S., R. 15 E., sec. 9, NE¼eNE¼e, W½NE¼e;                 sec. 10, NW¼eNW¼e;                 aggregating 160 acres.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6818-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 1222, Dated July 1, 1910, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373484
